name: Varisian Tattoo
source: Rise of the Runelords Player's Guide pg. 15
description: You bear intricate tattoos that inspire and empower your natural magic ability. These tattoos mark you as a worker of the ancient traditions of Varisian magic. A Varisian tattoo typically consists of a long string of complex characters from the Thassilonian alphabet.
benefit: Select a school of magic (other than divination) in which you have Spell Focusâ€”you cast spells from this school at +1 caster level. Additionally, you gain a single spell-like ability usable up to three times per day. The spell-like ability gained (and its Varisian name) are as follows:
